title: The access to the fire escape chute’s shaft shall be made at every floor level from lobby area or from staircase mid-landing with self-closing door having fire resistance of at least one hour
clause_text: The access to the fire escape chute’s shaft shall be made at every floor level from lobby area or from staircase mid-landing with self-closing door having fire resistance of at least one hour.
section: Fire Escape Chutes/ Controlled Lowering Device for evacuation-
